author: jbenet.
content: this is a result of using "tipsets" (multiple winning blocks per epoch -- it's a long, orthogonal story).  -- what _that_ changes is just needing to do an Estimation (+ penalty fee for being off) when submitting txns, so miners can go by your estimate.  -- can look at the Lotus code (in go as well) if you want to see impl and relevance

author: jbenet.
content: I think the biggest utility people will get from Filecoin using eip-1559 is maybe the data, and ability to run experiments on the mainnet. meaning if you have some significant improvement to try that has already been analyzed, we can take a look, consider it, and ship it to get data

author: jbenet.
content: on that note, there's a number of things i mentioned in that talk for you to consider -- specially the control plane. we'll likely try it out and can report back how it goes
